name: PIM_Triiodothyronine_T3
title: PIM_Triiodothyronine_(T3)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes for lab tests to detect Triiodothyronine (T3) levels),(Data Element Scope: LOINC associated to the lab tests),(Inclusion Criteria: Levels in serum or plasma by any method),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
